h2_title: Bishui Golden-Eyed Beast Boss Fight and Guide
content: The fight will begin immediately as the beast launches itself at you. It's extremely agile, and a lot of the fight will be the beast hurtling towards you, trying to take swipes at you. Despite this agility, you'll see familiar moves to other bosses you've encountered in this Chapter so far.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bishui_Golden-Eyed_Beast.md', within the main section titled 'Bishui Golden-Eyed Beast', specifically from the subsection 'Bishui Golden-Eyed Beast Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
The fight will begin immediately as the beast launches itself at you. It's extremely agile, and a lot of the fight will be the beast hurtling towards you, trying to take swipes at you. Despite this agility, you'll see familiar moves to other bosses you've encountered in this Chapter so far.
